title: Final Project Proposals Open
content: It's time to begin thinking about final projects! When you (and possibly a group) have come to a decision, submit a project proposal. Instructions can be found from the assignments tab.

title: Assignment 3 Released
content: Get ready to explore some terribly written Python code and look for ways to improve it!

title: Assignment 2 Released
content: The Quest for the Holy Grail has begun!

title: Course Applications
content: We are now accepting applications for CS41! Applications close on March 17th. You can apply at https://apply.stanfordpython.com/

title: Welcome to Python!
content: Hello world! Welcome to "CS 41: hap.py code." This course covers the fundamentals and contemporary usage of the Python programming language. This quarter is going to be amazing and I hope that you'll come along for the ride!
